content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to information on qualitative data such as the impact of infrastructure projects on the overall quality of life in Longford. However, it is generally understood that well-planned and well-implemented infrastructure projects can lead to several benefits such as improved connectivity, reduced travel time, increased economic opportunities, improved public health, and enhanced environmental sustainability.

Moreover, the success of infrastructure projects in improving the quality of life of Longford's residents would also depend on several factors such as the efficiency of implementation, adequate maintenance, and the involvement and participation of local communities in the planning process.
